thread.section_title: La Maison Favart - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfection!
thread.title_full: Perfection! - Review of La Maison Favart, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: BStonebridge
title: Perfection!
text: We just returned from a week's stay at La Maison Favart. It was perfect! The hotel is beautifully decorated and impeccably clean. The hotel staff went above and beyond to insure our stay was flawless; they were incredibly helpful with setting up tours, as well as coordinating dinner reservations to fit our needs. La Maison Favart is a boutique style hotel with a friendly and elegant vibe and quickly felt like a "home away from home" during our stay in Paris. I highly recommend staying there and look forward to returning again, soon.
